name: Asexual Characters
help-text: Characters who experience no sexual attraction to anyone, regardless of gender

name: Bisexual Characters
help-text: Characters attracted to persons of the same gender as them and the opposite gender

name: Genderfluid Characters
help-text:
Characters with a fluctuating gender identity or who identify as many/multiple genders
Shapeshifters do not automatically qualify

name: Homosexual Characters
help-text: Characters attracted to someone of the same gender

name: Non-Binary Characters
help-text: Characters who identify as non-binary rather than exclusively male or female

name: Pansexual Characters
help-text: Characters who clearly identify as having no distinction between genders concerning their sexuality

name: Transgender Characters
help-text: Characters who identify as having transitioned to a different gender

name: Hydra
help-text: Members of the terrorist organization Hydra

name: Acoustikinesis
help-text: Characters with the ability to manipulate soundwaves

name: Alpha Flight
help-text: Members of Canada's premier team of superheroes, Alpha Flight

name: Annihilators
help-text: Members of the Annihilators

name: Asgardians of the Galaxy
help-text: Members of the Asgardians of the Galaxy

name: Avengers
help-text: Members of Earth's Mightiest Heroes, the Avengers

name: Avengers Academy
help-text: Instructors and sutdents at Avengers Academy

name: Avengers West Coast
help-text: Members of the West Coast Avengers

name: Big Hero Six
help-text: Members of Japan's state-sanctioned superhero team, Big Hero Six

name: Black Order
help-text: Members of Thanos' elite henchmen, the Black Order

name: Brotherhood of Evil Mutants
help-text: Members of the occasionally terroristic mutant group, the Brotherhood of (Evil) Mutants

name: Champions
help-text: Members of the teenage superhero team, the Champions

name: Council of Godheads
help-text: Members of the committee of leaders of Earth's pantheons of gods

name: Defenders
help-text:
Members of the extra-dimensional defence force, the Defenders
Not to be confused with the Manhattan vigilante group

name: Excalibur
help-text: Members of the UK's state-sponsored X-Men counterpart, Excalibur

name: Fantastic Four
help-text: Members of the Fantastic Four

name: Great Lakes Avengers
help-text: Members of the Great Lakes <s>Avengers</s> <s>Lightning Rods</s> <s>S.W.O.R.D.</s> <s>X-Men</s> <s>Champions</s> Avengers

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
help-text: Members of the Guardians of the Galaxy

name: Heralds of Galactus
help-text: Individuals who have served the Devourer of Worlds, Galactus

name: Heroes for Hire
help-text: Members of any group called 'Heroes for Hire'

name: Illuminati
help-text: Members of the covert think-tank, the Illuminati

name: Invaders
help-text: Members of the Invaders and its successors

name: Knights of the Round Table
help-text: Members of the legendary Knights of the Round Table

name: Marauders (Pryde)
help-text: Members of the band of mutant raiders, the Marauders

name: Midnight Sons
help-text: Members of the demon-fighting Midnight Sons

name: New Fantastic Four
help-text: Members of the New Fantastic Four

name: New Mutants
help-text: Members of the New Mutants

name: Order of the Web
help-text: Members of the Order of the Web

name: Pet Avengers
help-text: Members of the Pet Avengers

name: Runaways
help-text: Members of the group of misfits and villains' children, the Runaways

name: S.H.I.E.L.D.
help-text: Members of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement, and Logistics Division

name: Secret Avengers (Black Ops Unit)
help-text: Members of the Secret Avengers (Black Ops Unit)

name: Secret Avengers (Civil War)
help-text: Members of the Secret Avengers (Civil War)

name: Secret Avengers (S.H.I.E.L.D.)
help-text: Members of the Secret Avengers (S.H.I.E.L.D.)

name: Secret Defenders
help-text: Members of the Defenders successor, the Secret Defenders

name: Sinister Six
help-text: Members of the several temporary villain team-ups called the Sinister Six

help-text: Members of the Spirits of Vengeance

name: Thor Corps
help-text: Members of the Thor Corps

name: Thunderbolts
help-text: Members of

name: Thunderbolts (Red Hulk)
help-text: Members of anti-hero strike-team successor to Code Red, the Thunderbolts

name: Thunderbolts (Revolution)
help-text: Members of the latest Thunderbolts team, first appearing in Dec 2023

name: U.S.Avengers
help-text: Members of the American patriotic-themed U.S.Avengers

name: Ultimates
help-text:
Members of the 2015 Ultimates team
Not to be confused with the 2006 Earth-1610 team

name: X-Factor Investigations
help-text:
Members of the mutant detective agency, X-Factor
Not to be confused with the 90's team of the same name

name: X-Force (Strike Team)
help-text: Members of X-Force (Strike Team)

name: X-Men
help-text: Members of the X-Men

name: Young Avengers
help-text: Members of the Young Avengers

name: Armor Users
help-text: Characters who have utilized technical or magical armor

name: Astral Projection
help-text: Characters who can leave their bodies behind while their mind/spirit goes to the Astral Plane

name: Atmokinesis
help-text: Characters who can manipulate all the natural forces responsible for weather

name: Bulletproof
help-text: Characters whose skin is tough enough to repel bullets

name: Captain Universe
help-text: Characters who have bonded with Captain Universe's Uni-Power

name: Chi Manipulation
help-text: Characters who can manipulate the body's bio-electric energy known as Chi/Qi

name: Concussive Blasts
help-text: Characters who can produce Concussive Blasts

name: Cosmic Awareness
help-text: Characters with enhanced consciousness or sensation of oneness with the universe

name: Ebony Blade User
help-text: Characters who have made use of the Ebony Blade

name: Empaths
help-text: Characters who can read or project emotions

name: Energy Absorption
help-text: Characters with the ability to absorb one or more types of energy

name: Energy Form
help-text: Characters who are, or can transform into, beings of pure energy

name: Flaming Body
help-text: Characters who can ignite themselves or turn into a flaming substance

name: Flight
help-text: Characters who can fly, whether through an ability or technological enhancements

name: Force Field
help-text: Characters who can create a force field around themselves or others

name: Hypnosis
help-text: Characters who can hypnotize others, whether through an ability or learned practice

name: Intangibility
help-text: Characters who cannot be touched byor can pass through solid matter, AKA phasing

name: Invisibility
help-text: Characters who can become invisible, not including through telepathy

name: Invulnerability
help-text: Characters with immunity to one or more forms of injury

name: Leaping
help-text: Characters who can leap, but not fly, to a superhuman degree

name: Magicians
help-text: Characters who, whether through ability or training, practice magic

name: Medium Awareness
help-text: Characters who have knowingly broken the fourth wall

name: Mind Control
help-text: Characters who can control a person's mind or alter their thoughts

name: Night Vision
help-text: Characters who can see in the dark

name: Optic Blasts
help-text: Characters who release various forms of energy from their eyes

name: Pheromones
help-text: Characters who can influence others through the use of pheromones

name: Phoenix Force
help-text: Characters who were able to manipulate the Phoenix Force

name: Plasma Generation
help-text: Characters who can produce external plasmo, typically for pyrotechnic blasts

name: Possession
help-text: Characters who can take mental control of others

name: Power Cosmic
help-text: Characters who can manipulate the Power Cosmic

name: Shapeshifters
help-text: Characters who can change all or parts of their shape/form

name: Size Alteration
help-text: Characters who can cause themselves or others to grow/shrink

name: Superhuman Smelling
help-text: Characters who can smell things beyond what is naturally possible

name: Telekinesis
help-text: Characters who can move objects/people through non-physical means

name: Trackers
help-text: Characters with advanced, innate tracking skills

name: Wallcrawling
help-text: Characters who can cling to surfaces by a variety of means

name: Web-Slinging
help-text: Characters who can use web-lines to swing from point to point

name: Wind Breath
help-text: Characters who can blow wind from their mouths or nostrils

name: Zoopathy
help-text: Characters who can control animals, usually only a specific species

name: Characters Displaced to Earth-616
help-text: Characters from non-Earth-616 realities who have taken up residence in Earth-616

name: Formerly Deceased
help-text: Living characters that have died and been restored to life

name: Weapon X
help-text: Staff and subjects involved in the U.S. Government's Weapon X project

name: Worthy of Mjolnir
help-text: Characters who have proved themselves worthy of lifting Mjolnir

name: Androids
help-text: Artificial beings designed to resemble humans as closely as possible

name: Eternals (Homo immortalis)
help-text: Members of the evolutionary offshoot of humanity created by the Celestials

name: Gamma Ray Exposure
help-text: Characters who have been altered by exposure to Gamma Radiation

name: Inhumans (Inhomo supremis)
help-text: Members of the genetic offshoot of humanity engineered by the Kree

name: Kree
help-text: Members of the Kree race, including Human/Kree hybrids

name: Olympians
help-text: Members of the extradimensional humanoids hailing from Olympus

name: Robots
help-text: Any robot, regardless of classification (android, cyborg, etc.)

name: Super-Soldiers
help-text: Characters who have been enhanced by the Super-Soldier Serum, including reproductions

name: Terrigenesis
help-text: Characters who have gotten powers through exposure to Terrigen Crystals/Mists

name: Chris Claremont
help-text: Created by Chris Claremont

name: Jack Kirby
help-text: Created by Jack Kirby

name: Jim Starlin
help-text: Created by Jim Starlin

name: Stan Lee
help-text: Created by Stan Lee

name: Steve Ditko
help-text: Created by Steve Ditko
